name: Buddy
bioPublic: Buddy is a sweet old man looking for a soft couch. Loves walks and naps.

name: Molly
bioPublic: Molly is shy but warms up with treats. Good with other dogs.

name: Charlie
bioPublic: Charlie is a feisty senior who loves car rides and has lots of personality!
notesInternal: Has separation anxiety, needs gradual introduction to new environments.
